entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.6°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Ice pellets mixed with snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing rain this evening. Rain along parts of the coast overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm along parts of the coast. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain in the morning. Rain along parts of the coast early in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Strait. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
